content.question: If <math alttext="y equals the square root of, x to the ninth power, end root" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><msqrt><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>9</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></msqrt></mrow></mstyle></math>, then <math alttext="the derivative of y with respect to x, equals" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mo>ⅆ</mo><mi>y</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>ⅆ</mo><mi>x</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo></mrow></mstyle></math>

choices.label: <math alttext="the fraction with numerator 9 times the square root of, x to the seventh power, end root, and denominator 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>9</mn><msqrt><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>7</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></msqrt></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="3 times the square root of, x to the eighth power, end root" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>3</mn><msqrt><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>8</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></msqrt></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the fraction with numerator 1, and denominator 2 times the square root of, x to the ninth power, end root, end fraction" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn><msqrt><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>9</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></msqrt></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the fraction with numerator 2 times the square root of, x to the eleventh power, end root, and denominator 11" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><msqrt><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>11</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></msqrt></mrow><mrow><mn>11</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="the fraction with numerator 9 times the square root of, x to the seventh power, end root, and denominator 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>9</mn><msqrt><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>7</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></msqrt></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math>

topic.text: 2.6: Derivative Rules - Constant, Sum, Difference, and Constant Multiple

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Apply appropriate mathematical rules or procedures, with and without technology.
